record.id: field.name="permission" and file.name="kmcategory" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: permission
record.file.name: kmcategory

brief.brief: An array of Knowledge Management group and profile mappings that grant permissions on the documents in this category.
This knowledge category/subcategory has a set of permissions associated with it. These permissions specify the profiles and document groups that have access to this category.
When you give a profile and document group access to this category, that profile and document group also has access to all of the subcategories below this point in the category hierarchy.
